snippet: Major League Baseball can exploit the networks’ growing appetites for live sports to increase the money it collects each year from deals like its current ones with ESPN, Fox and Turner.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column describes how Major League Baseball is increasing its earnings from television networks by raising the fees for broadcast rights as demand soars.
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball can exploit the networks’ growing appetites for live sports to increase the money it collects each year from deals like its current ones with ESPN, Fox and Turner.

headline.seo: Major League Baseball May Gain From NBC’s Needs
headline.main: For Baseball, TV Landscape Is Becoming a Pretty Picture
headline.print_headline: For Baseball, TV Landscape Is Becoming a Pretty Picture
